q.name: Radiant Blast
q.description: Kayle conjures a portal, summoning a celestial sword that pierces through enemies, slowing, damaging, and reducing the resistances of all hit.

w.name: Celestial Blessing
w.description: Blessed by the divine, Kayle heals and grants movement speed to herself and the nearest ally.

e.name: Starfire Spellblade
e.description:
Passive: Kayle's celestial sword, Virtue, deals bonus magic damage to enemies she attacks.

Active: Kayle's next attack smites her target with celestial fire, dealing bonus damage proportionate to their missing health.

r.name: Divine Judgment
r.description: Kayle makes an ally invulnerable and calls upon former Aspects of Justice to purify the area around her target with a holy rain of swords.

description: {{sbc|Innate - Zealous:}} '''Kayle's''' basic attacks against non-structures grant {{sti|as|{{as|6% '''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 5 seconds, stacking up to 5 times for a maximum of {{as|30% '''bonus''' attack speed}}. At maximum stacks, '''Kayle''' becomes {{as|Exalted|buzzword2}}, gaining {{sti|ms|{{as|15% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} when moving toward enemies.
Upon spending 6, 11, and 16 skill points, '''Kayle''' ascends into a new form, gaining additional bonuses.

{{sbc|Aflame - Level 6:}} While {{as|Exalted|buzzword2}}, '''Kayle's''' basic attacks against non-structures additionally launch a wave of fire in the target's direction, dealing {{pp|type=[[File:Starfire Spellblade.png|20px|link=]] Starfire Spellblade's Rank|6|10;10 to 30|0 to 5}} {{as|(+ 10% AD)}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}} {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} to enemies hit. The waves can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} for {{as|100% {{critical damage|100}} '''bonus''' magic damage|magic damage}}.

{{sbc|Arisen - Level 11:}} '''Kayle''' becomes a {{tip|ranged|ranged champion}} with {{sti|range|550 attack range}}. Additionally, ''Zealous's'' '''bonus''' attack speed is increased to {{as|10% '''bonus''' attack speed}} per stack, for a maximum of {{as|50% '''bonus''' attack speed}}.
{{sbc|Transcendent - Level 16:}} ''Zealous'' is set to maximum stacks. Additionally, ''Aflame's'' fiery waves now deal {{tip|true damage|{{as|true damage}}}}.
i1.name: Divine Ascent
notes: * If '''Kayle''' is in her attack animation after the stacks finish she gains another {{fd|0.5}} seconds to refresh / stack ''Zealous''.
* The waves apply [[spell effects]].
* The waves and passive stacks do not benefit from {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane}} or {{ii|Guinsoo's Rageblade}}.
* The on-hit effect and Exalted buff refresh when attacking turrets.
* Each upgrade applies upon spending the said numbers of skill points (i.e. 1 for {{sbc|Zealous}}, 6 for {{sbc|Aflame}}, 11 for {{sbc|Arisen}}, 16 for {{sbc|Transcendent}}).
** The {{sbc|Zealous}} effects are not gained until 1 skill point is spent.
* While in melee range she will attack with her sword, bypassing {{cai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}}.
** This will not negate the activation of ranged effects (i.e {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane}}).
* Upon becoming ''Arisen'', '''Kayle's''' portrait changes:
** On the original skin [[File:Kayle OriginalCircle.png|30px]] becomes [[File:Kayle OriginalCircle Arisen.png|30px]].
** On the Silver skin [[File:Kayle SilverCircle.png|30px]] becomes [[File:Kayle SilverCircle Arisen.png|30px]].
** On the Viridian skin [[File:Kayle ViridianCircle PreArisen.png|30px]] becomes [[File:Kayle ViridianCircle.png|30px]].
** On the Battleborn skin [[File:Kayle BattlebornCircle PreArisen.png|30px]] becomes [[File:Kayle BattlebornCircle.png|30px]].
** On the Aether Wing skin [[File:Kayle AetherWingCircle.png|30px]] becomes [[File:Kayle AetherWingCircle Arisen.png|30px]].
** On the Riot skin [[File:Kayle RiotCircle PreArisen.png|30px]] becomes [[File:Kayle RiotCircle.png|30px]].
** On the Pentakill skin [[File:Kayle PentakillCircle PreArisen.png|30px]] becomes [[File:Kayle PentakillCircle.png|30px]].
** {{csl|Kayle|Transcended}}, {{csl|Kayle|Judgment}}, and {{csl|Kayle|Iron Inquisitor}} do not change portrait.

riot.name: Radiant Blast
riot.description: Kayle conjures a portal, summoning a celestial sword that pierces through enemies, slowing, damaging, and reducing the resistances of all hit.
riot.tooltip:
Kayle summons a celestial sword that stops on the first enemy hit.

The sword deals {{ totaldamage }} magic damage to the target and enemies behind it, slows by {{ slowpercent }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds, and shreds Armor and Magic Resistance by {{ shredpercent }}% for {{ shredduration }} seconds.

description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kayle''' plants a portal at her initial location that faces the target direction. After a {{fd|0.5}}-second delay, a celestial sword launches forward from the portal.

The sword explodes into a cross upon collision with an enemy, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|Slow|slowing}} targets struck, while reducing their {{sti|lethality|{{as|armor}}}} and {{sti|magic penetration|{{as|magic resistance}}}} by 20% for 3 seconds.
q1.name: Radiant Blast
notes: * The VFX of the cross that spreads upon hitting its initial target shows the blade and guard of a sword.
** Despite the VFX suggesting otherwise, the two sides of the guard are each as long as the blade in terms of collision: approximately 295 units. {{pending for test}}

riot.name: Celestial Blessing
riot.description: Blessed by the divine, Kayle heals and grants movement speed to herself and the nearest ally.
riot.tooltip: Kayle and target allied champion are healed for <healing>{{ totalheal }} health</healing> and gain {{ totalhaste }} Movement Speed for {{ hasteduration }} seconds.

description: {{sbc|Active:}} After {{ct|cast|{{fd|0.25}} seconds|move=true}}, '''Kayle''' and target allied champion are {{tip|heal|healed}} and gain {{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}} for 2 seconds.
If cast without a valid target, or self-cast, ''Celestial Blessing'' will automatically target the most wounded ally in range.
leveling:
{{st|Heal|{{ap|60 to 180}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}}}}
{{st|Bonus Movement Speed|{{ap|26 to 50}}% {{as|(+ 10% per 100 AP)}}}}
w1.name: Celestial Blessing
notes: * No additional details

riot.name: Starfire Spellblade
riot.description:
Passive: Kayle's celestial sword, Virtue, deals bonus magic damage to enemies she attacks.

Active: Kayle's next attack smites her target with celestial fire, dealing bonus damage proportionate to their missing health.
riot.tooltip:
Passive: Attacks deal {{ epassivetotaldamage }} bonus magic damage.

Active: Kayle's next attack becomes ranged and deals {{ activeexecutepercent*100 }}% of the target's missing health as bonus magic damage. This attack upgrades when Kayle reaches Level {{ spell.kaylepassive:levelforpassiverank1 }}, causing it to explode when it hits the target, dealing damage to nearby enemies.

description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Kayle's''' basic attacks deal {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}. Additionally, {{ai|Divine Ascent|Kayle|Aflame's}} base damage is increased.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Kayle's''' next basic attack within 6 seconds fires a projectile after a {{fd|0.25}}-second delay that deals {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} but cannot {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}}. After unlocking {{ai|Divine Ascent|Kayle|Aflame}}, the attack explodes, damaging and applying [[on-hit]] effects to all enemies around the target.
Prior to becoming {{ai|Divine Ascent|Kayle|Arisen}}, ''Starfire Spellblade'' also causes '''Kayle''' to become a {{tip|ranged|ranged champion}} with 550 attack range on the empowered attack.
leveling: {{st|Bonus Magic Damage|{{as|{{ap|10 to 20}}% of target's '''missing''' health}}}}
e1.name: Starfire Spellblade
notes: * ''Starfire Spellblade's'' active applies both on-hit and spell effects.
* Before becoming {{ai|Divine Ascent|Kayle|Arisen}}, when attacking below 175 range, ''Starfire Spellblade's'' active is considered a {{tip|melee}} attack (i.e. it will trigger {{ii|Tiamat}}).
** After unlocking ''Aflame'', the exploding attack will only trigger the {{ii|Tiamat|Cleave and Crescent}} passives on the primary target, unlike all other on-hit effects.
* '''Kayle's''' target essentially takes double damage from her innate if they do not avoid the fiery wave, as the on-hit damage and wave damage will stack.

riot.name: Divine Judgment
riot.description: Kayle makes an ally invulnerable and calls upon former Aspects of Justice to purify the area around her target with a holy rain of swords.
riot.tooltip:
Kayle makes an allied champion invulnerable for {{ invulnduration }} seconds.

Then, after a cast time, she purifies the area around them dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage to nearby enemies.

description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kayle''' refreshes {{ai|Zealous|Kayle}} and grants the target allied champion or herself {{tip|invulnerability}} for a few seconds.

'''Kayle''' also begins {{ct|cast|conjuring|move=true|items=false,true|spells=true,true,false,false|death=false}} swords around herself and highlights an area around her target for {{fd|1.5}} seconds. At the end of the channel, the swords rain down and deal {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies within the area around her target.
r1.name: Divine Judgement
notes: * The mana expenditure only occurs after the cast time, though Kayle requires at least 100 mana to begin the cast.
** The ability will still go off if Kayle has less than the required mana at the time of expenditure.
